results.name: Number of integer solutions to a^2 + b^2 + c^2 + 3*d^2 = n.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
J. Liouville, Sur La Forme x^2+y^2+z^2+3t^2, Journal de Mathématiques Pures et appliquées (2) 8, 193-204 (1863).
formula: G.f.: theta_3(q)^3*theta_3(q^3), where theta_3() is the Jacobi theta function. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Aug 01 2018
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 15 2014
